entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
